perturbation.original_text: 1.4 CO-BRANDED CAREER CENTER shall mean the Site located at an URL to be mutually agreed upon (which agreement shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed) containing a VerticalNet Mark and a Neoforma Mark listing openings for positions and posting other career information in the medical and healthcare fields substantially in the form of the existing "Career Center" portions of the VerticalNet Medical Online Communities.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.4 CO-BRANDED CAREER CENTER shall mean the Site located at an URL to be mutually agreed upon (which agreement shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed) containing a VerticalNet Mark and a Neoforma Mark listing openings for positions and posting other career information in the medical and healthcare fields substantially in the form of the existing "Job Board" portions of the VerticalNet Medical Online Communities.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Career Center' is replaced with 'Job Board.' It's unclear whether 'Career Center' and 'Job Board' refer to the same thing, creating potential for disputes about the scope of the agreement if VerticalNet has both a 'Career Center' and a 'Job Board' with different functionalities.

perturbation.original_text: 1.39 PRODUCT LISTING shall mean a listing of a third party's product at a Site in exchange for a fee, commission, or other compensation for purposes of promoting the sale of such third party's product to a third party purchaser, including, without limitation, sales by auction.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.39 PRODUCT LISTING shall mean a listing of a third party's product at a Site in exchange for a fee or commission for the purposes of showcasing such third party's product to potential customers, excluding any form of auction sale.
perturbation.explanation: The original text includes 'sales by auction' within the definition of 'Product Listing.' The modified text explicitly excludes 'any form of auction sale.' This creates a direct contradiction about whether auction sales are included in the definition of Product Listing, affecting revenue calculations and exclusivity clauses.

perturbation.original_text: 7.1.1 During the Term, VerticalNet shall have the non-exclusive right (except as to Neoforma) to arrange for the sale of Advertising on Neoforma Plan (and any other parts of the Neoforma Sites within which Neoforma elects to include Advertising) to third parties. During the Term, the parties shall meet from time to time to discuss the Advertising inventory available for sale. Any Advertising inventory that Neoforma appoints VerticalNet to arrange to sell shall not also be appointed to any third party to arrange for sale to third parties.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.1.1 During the Term, VerticalNet shall have the non-exclusive right (except as to Neoforma) to arrange for the sale of Advertising on Neoforma Plan (and any other parts of the Neoforma Sites within which Neoforma elects to include Advertising) to third parties. During the Term, the parties shall meet from time to time to discuss the Advertising spots available for sale. Any Advertising space that Neoforma allows VerticalNet to arrange to sell may also be managed by other agents.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Advertising inventory' is replaced with 'Advertising spots', and a clause is added clarifying Advertising space may also be managed by other agents. This contradicts the implied exclusivity in the original text, leading to disputes over sales commissions and territories.
